name: google-tasks
description: Google Tasks API Model Context Protocol Server.

tools.name: search
tools.description: Search for tasks in Google Tasks.

tools.name: list
tools.description: List all tasks in Google Tasks.

tools.name: create
tools.description: Create a new task in Google Tasks.

tools.name: update
tools.description: Update an existing task in Google Tasks.

tools.name: delete
tools.description: Delete a task in Google Tasks.

tools.name: clear
tools.description: Clear completed tasks from a Google Tasks task list.
